009package imagingbook.common.util.bits;
010
011/**
012 * This class implements {@link BitVector} with internal 32-bit {@code int} data.
013 * @author WB
014 */
015public class BitVector32 implements BitVector {
016        
017        private static final int WL = 32;
018        
019        private final int[] data;
020        private final int length;
021        
022        public BitVector32(int length) {
023                if (length <= 0) {
024                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("bit vector length must be at least 1");
025                }
026                this.length = length;
027                int n = (length % WL == 0) ? length / WL : length / WL + 1;     // word count
028                this.data = new int[n];
029        }
030        
031        public BitVector32(byte[] bytes) {
032                this(bytes.length);
033                for (int i = 0; i < bytes.length; i++) {
034                        if (bytes[i] != 0) {
035                                this.set(i);
036                        }
037                }
038        }
039        
040        public BitVector32(boolean[] bools) {
041                this(bools.length);
042                for (int i = 0; i < bools.length; i++) {
043                        this.set(i, bools[i]);
044                }
045        }
046        
047        // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
048
049        @Override
050        public int getLength() {
051                return this.length;
052        }
053        
054        @Override
055        public boolean get(int i) {
056                if (i < 0 || i >= length) {
057                        throw new IndexOutOfBoundsException("illegal index " + i);
058                }
059                final int mask = 1 << (i % WL);
060                return (data[i / WL] & mask) != 0;
061        }
062        
063        @Override
064        public void set(int i) {
065                if (i < 0 || i >= length) {
066                        throw new IndexOutOfBoundsException("illegal index " + i);
067                }
068                final int j = i / WL;   // word index
069                final int mask = 1 << (i % WL);
070                data[j] =  data[j] | mask;
071        }
072        
073        @Override
074        public void unset(int i) {
075                if (i < 0 || i >= length) {
076                        throw new IndexOutOfBoundsException("illegal index " + i);
077                }
078                final int j = i / WL;   // word index
079                final int mask = 0x01 << (i % WL);
080                data[j] =  data[j] & ~mask;
081        }
082        
083        @Override
084        public void setAll() {
085                for (int j = 0; j < data.length; j++) {
086                        data[j] = ~0;
087                }
088        }
089
090        @Override
091        public void unsetAll() {
092                for (int j = 0; j < data.length; j++) {
093                        data[j] = 0;
094                }
095        }
096        
097        @Override
098        public String toString() {
099                StringBuilder buf = new StringBuilder();
100                buf.append(BitVector32.class.getSimpleName() + "[");
101                for (int i = 0; i < length; i++) {
102                        buf.append(this.get(i) ? "1" : "0");
103                }
104                buf.append("]");
105                return buf.toString();
106        }
107        
108//      //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
109//      
110//      public static void main(String[] args) {
111//              int K = 99;
112//              BitVector32 b = new BitVector32(K);
113//              
114//              System.out.println(b.toString());
115//              b.setAll();
116//              System.out.println(b.toString());
117//              b.unsetAll();
118//              System.out.println(b.toString());
119//              System.out.println();
120//              
121//              for (int i = 0; i < b.length; i++) {
122//                      b.set(i);
123//                      System.out.println(b.toString());
124//                      b.unset(i);
125//              }
126//      }
127
128}
